snippet.title: Metal Bank intersects gold at Triumph
snippet.content: Metal Bank has intersected significant high-grade Au-Ag mineralisation from an initial RC drilling at the Triumph project. Four initial drill holes were completed within the corridor with high-grade gold intersected including 18m @ 4.0g/t Au, 15g/t Ag from surface (Big Hans prospect) and 3m @ 6.5g/t Au, 13g/t Ag from 6m (Super Hans prospect). This program represents the first modern gold exploration to be undertaken across the broad target zone. Originally published as
